customInstructions: PulsePilot Frontend follows strict design guidelines documented in .cursorrules file. All code must adhere to these standards.
For components/comments directory, enforce strict typing and React best practices.
Use react-window (not react-virtualized) for all virtualization.
Follow atomic design principles with UI components in ui/, containers in containers/, state in state/, and models in models/.
Ensure proper null checking with optional chaining and nullish coalescing.
Maintain component structure under 250 lines of code.
Use Zustand for state management with selectors for performance.
Follow the 12-column grid for responsive layouts.
Always use proper error handling and loading states.
Do not use @ts-ignore or any type under any circumstances.
